content: No backups have been created yet. Create one or more backups for them to appear in this list.

comment.text: This translation key displays a message indicating that no backups have been created yet, and is used to provide feedback to users when they view an empty backup list on the portal settings page.

usage.context:
<Text
 fontSize="12px"
 textAlign="center"
 className="backup-restore_empty-list"
 >
 {t("EmptyBackupList")}
 </Text>
 )
 ) : (
 <div className="loader" key="loader">
 <ListLoader count={7} />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'damit sie in dieser Liste erscheint' is grammatically awkward. 'sie' refers to the backups, but the sentence structure implies it refers to something else. A more natural phrasing would reflect the backups appearing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: damit diese in der Liste erscheinen

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'No hay ningunas copias de seguridad' is redundant. 'Ningunas' is unnecessary as 'No hay' already implies a negative.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: No hay copias de seguridad creadas todavía.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Cree por lo menos una copia' translates literally as 'Create at least one copy.' While understandable, a more natural and accurate translation for 'Create one or more backups' would be 'Cree una o más copias'.

The phrase 'Ei varmuuskopioita' is a bit abrupt. While technically correct ('No backups'), it lacks the softening of the English phrase. A more natural Finnish translation would be something like 'Ei ole luotu varmuuskopioita'.
The phrasing 'ja ne näkyvät tässä listassa' is grammatically correct, but stylistically a bit clunky. A smoother flow would use a connector implying consequence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ja luodut varmuuskopiot näkyvät tässä listassa.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: There's an unnecessary space before the colon in the sentence "Պահուստային պատճեններ դեռ չեն ստեղծվել:Ստեղծեք".

The phrase 'Create one or more backups' is translated as 'Crea almeno una copia di backup'. While understandable, 'Crea almeno una copia di backup' is slightly less natural. A more direct translation of 'create one or more' would be 'creare un backup o più'.
The phrase "ສໍາລັບ​ການ​ໃຫ້​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ປາ​ກົດ​ຢູ່​ໃນ​ບັນ​ຊີ​ລາຍ​ການ​ນີ້" is overly verbose and not the most natural way to express 'to appear in this list'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ສໍາລັບເຂົາເຈົ້າປະກົດຢູ່ໃນບັນຊີລາຍການນີ້

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence is quite long and could be broken down for better readability in Lao. While not strictly incorrect, it's less fluent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ຍັງ​ບໍ່​ມີ​ການ​ສ້າງ​ການ​ສໍາ​ຮອງ​ຂໍ້​ມູນ​ໃດໆ​ເທື່ອ. ສ້າງ​ຫນຶ່ງ​ຫຼື​ຫຼາຍ​ສໍາ​ຮອງ​ຂໍ້​ມູນ​ເພື່ອ​ໃຫ້​ເຂົາ​ເຈົ້າ​ປະກົດ​ໃນ​ບັນ​ຊີ​ລາຍ​ການ​ນີ້​.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "vismaz vienu" (at least one) is somewhat stiff and less natural than a more direct translation of 'one or more'. It implies a minimum requirement which might not be the intended nuance.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Izveidojiet vienu vai vairākas rezerves kopijas, lai tā parādītos šajā sarakstā.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "pentru ca acestea să apară" is grammatically correct, but stylistically awkward in this context. A more natural Romanian phrasing would be "pentru a apărea".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nu există nicio copie de rezervă salvată. Creați una sau mai multe copii de rezervă pentru a apărea în lista.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'තවමත් උපස්ථයක් සාදා නැත. ඒවා මෙහි දිස්වීමට උපස්ථයක් හෝ කිහිපයක් සාදන්න.' doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of the English 'No backups have been created yet. Create one or more backups for them to appear in this list.'.  'ඒවා' (ewa) translates to 'they' but the 'they' refers to the backups.  A more accurate phrasing would clarify the subject. The current phrasing could be misinterpreted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තවමත් උපස්ථයක් සාදා නැත. ඒවා මෙහි දිස්වීමට උපස්ථයක් හෝ කිහිපයක් සාදා ගන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a slightly informal tone ('සාදා ගන්න'). While acceptable, a more formal tone might be preferred for Settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: තවමත් උපස්ථයක් සාදා නැත. ඒවා මෙහි දිස්වීමට උපස්ථයක් හෝ කිහිපයක් සාදාහ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "які з'являтимуться у цьому списку" (which will appear in this list) is slightly awkward and not the most natural way to express the intended meaning. It implies the backups appear *because* they are created, rather than just stating they will be visible once created.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Резервні копії з'являться у цьому списку після їх створення.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "Create one or more backups" is not perfectly reflected in the Chinese translation. While "创建一个或多个备份" is literal, a more natural phrasing for a user interface could be "创建备份". This implies creating at least one backup.
